Description: Fragment of flattened handle at neck join to moderate turn of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay medium brown. Rectangular stamp with grape cluster symbol.
Type series: KT714 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Curator's comments: Name Theudamos. A parallel from Olbia Pontica is noted by N. Jefremow, Die Amphorenstempel des hellenistischen Knidos, Munich 1995, 218, no. 923.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (318)
